Package network

Interface ClientInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientNetworkRMIInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientNetworkRMI, ClientNetworkSocket
    public interface ClientInterface
    Methods called by the client to the network layer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int close()
      Method used by the client to notify the server that the connection is going to be closed
      void getMap()
      Method used to require a new GameMapView
      int mirror​(int num)
      Method used to test the connection.
      void modeRequest​(boolean normalMode)
      Method used during the login phase to vote the mode that is required
      void pick​(java.lang.String choiceIf, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
      Method used to notify the server that a new pick has to be done.
      void poll()
      Method used by the client to ask the server for updates
      Tuple3<java.lang.Boolean,​java.lang.Boolean,​Tuple<java.lang.String,​GameMode>> reconnect​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method used to require a login procedure after a disconnection (the player must have a username and password)
      boolean register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String color)
      Method used to require a login procedure.

    • Method Detail

      • mirror

        int mirror​(int num)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to test the connection. It sends an integer to the server and wait until the same integer is returned
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • close

        int close()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by the client to notify the server that the connection is going to be closed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • register

        boolean register​(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password,
                 java.lang.String color)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 InvalidLoginException
        Method used to require a login procedure.
        Parameters:
        username - the name requested
        password - the password used
        color - the color requested
        Returns:
        true iif the login operation worked correctly
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - this exception contains all the information needed to identify the error
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • reconnect

        Tuple3<java.lang.Boolean,​java.lang.Boolean,​Tuple<java.lang.String,​GameMode>> reconnect​(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                         java.lang.String password)
                                                                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                                                                         InvalidLoginException
        Method used to require a login procedure after a disconnection (the player must have a username and password)
        Parameters:
        username - the name requested
        password - the password used
        Returns:
        A triple containing: a boolean that indicates if the the login operation worked correctly, a boolean that indicates if the game is already started, and a tuple that contains the name and the mode of the game
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - this exception contains all the information needed to identify the error
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • pick

        void pick​(java.lang.String choiceIf,
          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to notify the server that a new pick has to be done.
        Parameters:
        choiceIf - the indentifier of the choice
        choices - a list containing all the element picked
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getMap

        void getMap()
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to require a new GameMapView
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        void poll()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by the client to ask the server for updates
